segments.advisor_message: So, regarding your monthly expenses, have you given any more thought to your car insurance? I remember you mentioned it was roughly around $120 a month.
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, actually, I think it’s more like, I dunno, $140 or something. I just, I realized I, I kinda overlooked that, you know?

segments.advisor_message: No problem! It’s good that we clarified that. And what about the ownership of that insurance? Is it in your name or your spouse's?
segments.client_message: Oh, it’s mine, definitely mine. My spouse doesn’t drive much, so I handle all the car stuff, right?
